snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight - Robin: A Flip of a Coin (Full DLC Walkthrough)
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight - Arkham Episode - Robin "A Flip of a Coin" Full DLC Story Walkthrough \ Guide in Full HD (1080p)

===================================

Related Trophies and Achievements:
● Succession Plans - Break into Hell's Gate HQ and apprehend Two-Face.

===================================

Game available on: Sony PlayStation 4, Microsoft Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: PlayStation 4

===================================

Follow BatmanArkhamVideos on:
● YouTube - http://www.youtube.com/BatmanArkhamVideos
● Twitter- http://www.twitter.com/ArkhamVideos
● Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BatmanArkhamNews
